item.title: RPG Backstories
item.description: My favourite part of D&D to date has been pouring over resources and thinking up a backstory for my character. I don’t have a long history with tabletop RPGs other than being interested in D&D for many, many years. In 2014 I was lucky enough to have coworkers who were interested in playing, as well as a wonderful GM. We started a D&D 4th edition party.Â That was a good experience, but something about it didn’t really feel right to me; it wasn’t particularly engaging and the game felt repetitive.
